results.title: Integrating disabled children into regular schools (TEFC)
results.creator_credit: Joe Dora and Chisholm Institute of Technology. School of Education
results.brief_description: Integrating disabled children into mainstream schools throughout Australia requires careful thought and action on the part of the disabled, their parents, teachers and all concerned. This video presents the thoughts of these people in discrete segments suitable for discussion.

results.title: Integrated Alternative Health Care
results.brief_description: We are shown the full range of medical and educational programs with their new approach to integrated care, which has also been called alternative medicine. The film focuses on the role of paramedics and on their education and their motivation.

results.title: Insult to Injury
results.brief_description: A Greek factory employee injured his back at work. This program examines the problems that he encountered with doctors, Workers’ Compensation, and Unions, and their attitudes towards him.

results.title: Instructing the worker on the job
results.brief_description: A new female employee is told to do a job on the drill press; she is unable to do the job and is then shown how to do it; this does not have the desired effect and in distress she leaves the machine; the supervisor then takes more care over instructing the next young woman assigned to operate the machine, and she becomes a competent operator. Thus are the differences between telling, showing, and instructing demonstrated.
results.description: A new female employee is told to do a job on the drill press; she is unable to do the job and is then shown how to do it; this does not have the desired effect and in distress she leaves the machine; the supervisor then takes more care over instructing the next young woman assigned to operate the machine, and she becomes a competent operator. Thus are the differences between telling, showing, and instructing demonstrated.

Thus are the differences between telling, showing, and instructing demonstrated.

results.title: Instinct
results.creator_credit: Jon Turteltaub, Christina Steinberg, Brian Doubleday, Richard Lerner, Michael Taylor, Barbara Boyle and Touchstone Pictures
results.brief_description: This psychological thriller is about an anthropologist, Ethan Powell, who leaves human society to live among gorillas. Fully ensconced in this animal world, Powell is extradited back to the United States after murdering two gorilla poachers. Once there, it falls to an ambitious psychiatrist to discover the non-communicative Powell’s secrets. With in-form performances by Anthony Hopkins and Cuba Gooding Jr, this film attempts with profundity to address human nature, harmony with the natural world, and what motivates passions bordering on insanity. Cast also includes Donald Sutherland.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Jon Turteltaub, Christina Steinberg, Brian Doubleday, Richard Lerner, Michael Taylor, Barbara Boyle and Touchstone Pictures
